articles.title: 'One of the best amateur fights ever': Indian boxer Ashish Kumar suffers heartbreaking loss in an 'epic' CWG quarterfinal bout - The Indian Express
articles.description: In what's hailed as one of the finest amateur bouts, the Indian light heavyweight boxer loses to home favourite Aaron Bowen via split decision in the quarterfinal.
articles.content: The nonchalant jives of the feet. An admirable looseness in the limbs. A certain cockiness on occasions where he would lean forward, hands down by his side, almost egging his opponent to take a pop. … [+4712 chars]
